definitions: a cream or lotion rubbed on to the skin to protect it from the sun

examples.text: she brings along plenty of sunscreen

shortDefinitions: cream or lotion rubbed on to skin to protect it from sun

definitions: an active ingredient in creams, lotions and other preparations for the skin

examples.text: lips get sunburned too, so apply a lip balm that contains sunscreen with an SPF of 15 or higher

shortDefinitions: active ingredient of creams and lotions intended to protect skin from sun
